title: core
text:
source

count_values

 count_values (df:pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, col:str, order:bool=True)

Count the number of values in a column and return a dataframe with the results.




Type
Default
Details




df
DataFrame

A pandas dataframe


col
str

A column name


order
bool
True
Order the results by count


Returns
DataFrame
